content: Generate an animation where the rings change colors, synchronized precisely with the start and end times of each lyric word provided in the list. I want you to use pink and green, and pastel color (saturation)

[Action: "update_animation"]: I need to fix my previous animation by ensuring each effect has exactly ONE effect type. The error occurred because I was combining multiple effects (like color and brightness) in the same effect configuration. I'll create separate effect entries for each type of effect (color, brightness, etc.) that target the same elements and time periods, ensuring that each effect has only one type.
